name: Fuxion
description:
The wonderful color that we usually see, now was gone. It is your time to find and restore it...

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam. This is the first time I've participated in itch game jam, and I wish you guys enjoy it. Thx for visiting.

Click on the sprite to control the sprite. the other Instruction was on the game. If its to hard I'm really sorry. But if its also to easy, I'm also really sorry. Hope you enjoy it.

For the credits, all of the art was done by me, for the font i got some from dafont, and the music i made it by myself (sorry if its not to good, again). Lastly, for the sound effect i made it all by myself, except for the sound effect of the laser, i got it from freesound by waxsocks, also the floor was modified a little from Natan Costa tile.  

Oh yeah, for the character sprite it was really inspired by the Asprite logo.
